detectors.description:
VAMPUNIPOOL.notifyRewardAmount() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VAMPUNIPOOL.sol#759-776) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = initreward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VAMPUNIPOOL.sol#765)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VAMPUNIPOOL.sol#768)
